text: The 1921-22 Todd Shipyards F.C. season was the first season for Todd Shipyards F.C. and its first season in the American Soccer League. The Todd Shipyards Corporation had previously fielded the professional Robins Dry Dock F.C. and the amateur Tebo Yacht Basin F.C.. The company combined the clubs to form Todd Shipyards F.C. and entered that club in the American Soccer League. Todd Shipyards F.C. finished 3rd in the league.
